div.div:
Happy Earth day everyone!
This week Amber Schwartz second grade class has been learning about how they can care for our planet in celebration of Earth Day. They learned how they can help the Earth by reducing, reusing and recycling. The class created pictures of the Earth in the shape of a heart to help us remember to love and care for our planet. Awesome job!
